markdownRemark.html:
I'm a third year Ph.D. Student in Computer Science at UC Santa Barbara. I’m in the UCSB NLP Group and my advisor is Professor William Y. Wang. My research interests are natural language processing and deep learning. More specifically, I’m interested in Bayesian deep learning, deep generative models and their applications.

I received my M.S. in Data Science from NYU in 2016. I also hold a Bachelor’s from Tsinghua University and a Master’s degree from UC Davis both in Civil Engineering.
